name: Typo (itch) (Aleksa Vukicevic)
description:
Challenge your friends with 1 on 1 multiplayer typing battles. Compete on a global scale with worldwide leaderboards and improve your typing speed. The best way to practice is while having fun with your friends. And don't forget, don't make typos ;)

Tap the "Get it on Google Play" button and have fun :)

It's still in beta btw
